data.name: XSLT_DefaultTemplate
data.value:
<xsl:value-of select='title'/>

Published:   by   on
  <a href=''> Enclosure (, Bytes) </a>
<xsl:value-of select='//channel/title'/>

Published:   by   on
  <a href=''> Enclosure (, Bytes) </a>
<xsl:value-of select='//item/title'/>

Published:    
  <a href=''> Enclosure (, Bytes) </a>

data.name: URL_WebHelp
data.value: http://www.rssbandit.org/docs/
data.comment: used to navigate to Bandit docs (Help)

data.name: URL_FeedValidationBase
data.value: http://www.feedvalidator.org/check?url=
data.comment: used to validate a RSSfeed, default on invalid .config

data.name: URL_FeedLinkCosmosUrlBase
data.value: http://www.technorati.com/cosmos/links.html?rank=links&url=
data.comment: used to navigate to Technorati Link Cosmos, default on invalid .config

data.name: URL_BugReport
data.value: http://sourceforge.net/tracker/?atid=615248&group_id=96589&func=browse
data.comment: Bug report page at Sourceforge (no logon required), default on invalid .config

data.name: URL_ProjectNews
data.value: http://sourceforge.net/news/?group_id=96589
data.comment: News page at Sourceforge, default on invalid .config

data.name: URL_WikiWebNews
data.value: http://www.rssbandit.org/
data.comment: Bandit Wiki Site, default on invalid .config

data.name: URL_UserForum
data.value: http://www.rssbandit.org/forum/
data.comment: Bandit User Forum, default on invalid .config

data.name: RES_FeedDefaultCategory
data.value: [分類していないフィード]

data.name: RES_UpgradeInfoBoxCaption
data.value: 更新情報
data.comment: Caption of the Upgrade Info Messagebox

data.name: RES_UpgradeFeedlistInfoText
data.value:
{0} の現在のバージョンは、新機能、バグ修正をサポートします. requires a change of your feedlist file format. To keep your older versions running, the application will try to create a new feedlist file from your current list.
The old file will be left untouched.
Do you want to continue?
data.comment: Info text used to inform a user about a feedlist file format change.

data.name: RES_InvalidFeedFileInfoBoxCaption
data.value: フィードファイルに問題があります
data.comment: Caption of the infobox displaying an error message about an invalid feedlist file

data.name: RES_InvalidFeedURIBoxText
data.value: フィード用に指定された URL に問題があります
data.comment: Text of dialog if invalid URI specified when creating a new feed

data.name: RES_InvalidFeedURIBoxCaption
data.value: 不正な URL です
data.comment: Caption of dialog if invalid URI specified when creating a new feed

data.value: XSLT スタイルシートをコンパイルできません

data.name: RES_ExceptionInvalidXmlChracterMessage
data.value: 文字に問題があります
data.comment: Due to the somewhat unspecific Xml exceptions (no error numbers) we had to detect a specific error message by string matching (this one) to find the message reporting a invalid character (they include the invalid char, that breaks our rendering)

data.value: 処理中止. タイトルは必須です

data.value: 証明書は、すでに信頼済みチェインに含まれています

data.value: 証明書発行元は、すでに信頼チェインに含まれています

data.value: セキュリティ証明書に不明な問題がありますm: '{0}'.
